mapper.select:
select
from user_address where is_del = 0 and is_forbidden = 0 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update user_address set is_main = 0 where is_del = 0 and is_forbidden = 0 and is_main = 1 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update user_address set is_main = 1 where is_del = 0 and is_forbidden = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update:
update user_address
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consignee_phone = #{consigneePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = version + 1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
